title: Sight...unseen
creator_contributor_role: Australian Science Education Project, production company

description: Shows a range of educational activities at the North Rocks School for blind children. Braille music, braille typewriters and other tactile and mobility aids are demonstrated. Suitable for tertiary and teacher levels.
